channel.title: Nagios on TLDR Dev Notes
channel.description: Recent content in Nagios on TLDR Dev Notes

item.title: Nagios
item.description: Install: apt update && apt install -y nagios3 Check install: dpkg -l | grep -i nagios Default login: nagiosadmin, g_!_o Listing packages of nagios: dpkg -L nagios3 NOTES aptitude is a front-end for dpkg. dpkg is the package manager.
